item.title: Why Mr. Monk’s Last Case Movie Recast Trudy’s Daughter Molly
item.description: After 14 years, Monk recasts Molly Evans, with Caitlin McGee bringing a new take on the beloved character in the long awaited movie.

item.title: Popular Explained: The Glinda Song's Full Lyrics & What It Really Means In Wicked
item.description: Ariana Grande’s Glinda sings often throughout Wicked: Part One, but the song that truly defines her storyline and her character as a whole is Popular.

item.title: If You Love The Nightmare Before Christmas, You Need To Watch This 91% RT Fantasy Movie On Disney+ This Holiday Season
item.description: If The Nightmare Before Christmas is on your holiday watch list, you might also want to check out this underrated Tim Burton movie on Disney+.
